funding-source.named-content: Interdisciplinary Center of Clinical Research of the Münster Medical School

funding-group.funding-statement: This work was supported by funding to U.R. and S.L. from the Interdisciplinary Center of Clinical Research of the Münster Medical School (IZKF, RE2/026/15, and Lud2/008/17) and the German Research Foundation (DFG; U.R.: SFB1009/A06, SFB1348/A11, GRK 1409, and S.L.: SFB1009/B02, Lu477/23-1, GRK 1409).
